name: The Right Perspective (Rob Swor)
description:
This game was created in less than 48 hours for the 2017 WolverineSoft Pumpkin Jam at the University of Michigan, where the theme was "/rīt/".

The Right Perspective is a minimalist, grid-based puzzle game where you can only move right, or you can only not move right. Traverse the grid and rotate the camera to try and reach the goal!

Created by:

  • Derek Ge
  • Matthew Rader
  • Jacob Smellie
  • Rob Swor
